sentences.en: Already there are murmurs of discontent.
Any signs of discontent tend to be magnified and overanalyzed.
sentences.cn: 稍有不满便会被上纲上线。

sentences.en: By tacit agreement they turned to the wine to dispel their discontent.
sentences.cn: 他们不约而同的想拿酒杀气.

sentences.en: Discontent among the ship's crew finally led to the outbreak of mutiny.
sentences.cn: 船员的不满情绪最终酿成了暴乱。

sentences.en: Graham attempted to quash rumours of growing discontent.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆试图平息有关不满情绪日益强烈的流言。

sentences.en: I heard a mutter of discontent.
sentences.cn: 我听到有人小声咕哝着表示不满.

sentences.en: Of all the workers in the country bituminous miners probably had best grounds for discontent.
sentences.cn: 在全国所有的工人中，可能烟煤矿工不满的理由最充分。

sentences.en: Perhaps she sensed my growing discontent .
sentences.cn: 也许她感觉到了我越来越不满。

sentences.en: Remember not to mention your discontent.
sentences.cn: 记住，不要提到你对工作的不满。

sentences.en: Taft continued stubbornly to defend him and thus exacerbated popular discontent.
sentences.cn: 塔夫脱继续顽固地包庇他.这就加剧了公众的不满.
观众因不满而嗡嗡地说话.

sentences.en: The news roused discontent and indignation of the workers.
sentences.cn: 这消息激起了工人们的怨愤.

sentences.en: The riots are a clear manifestation of the people's discontent.
sentences.cn: 骚乱清楚地表明了人们的不满情绪。

sentences.en: There is widespread discontent among the staff at the proposed changes to pay and conditions.
sentences.cn: 员工对改变工资和工作环境的建议普遍不满。

sentences.en: There were rumblings of discontent within the ranks.
They abused their power and bullied the people , thus arousing intense discontent among the masses.
sentences.cn: 他们仗势欺人, 引起群众强烈的不满.

sentences.en: This state of discontent and disillusionment created a real crisis for the Republic.
sentences.cn: 怨声载道和理想破灭的现状给共和国造成了极为严重的危机.

words.tran_cn: 不满意（discontent的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 不满，不平，不愉快，不满的人
trans.tran_en: a feeling of being unhappy and not satisfied with the situation you are in
